name: Incremental Elemental Assault
descriptionText: You may activate and quench your elemental assault ability multiple times per day.
benefitText: You may use your elemental assault ability in 1-round increments, up to a maximum number of rounds per day equal to your character level. These rounds do not have to be consecutive. Activating the ability is a swift action; ending it is a free action.
normalText: You can use elemental assault once per day. It lasts a number of rounds equal to your class level.
